verses.verse: קְֽרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> Call נָ֭א <S%H4994><s%> now הֲיֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> now if there be עוֹנֶ֑ךָּ <S%H6030><s%> any that will answer וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> which מִקְּדֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H6918><s%> thee and to which of the saints תִּפְנֶֽה׃ <S%H6437><s%> wilt thou turn

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֶֽ֭אֱוִיל <S%H191><s%> the foolish man יַהֲרָג־ <S%H2026><s%> killeth כָּ֑עַשׂ <S%H3708><s%> For wrath וּ֝פֹתֶ֗ה <S%H6601><s%> the silly one תָּמִ֥ית <S%H4191><s%> slayeth קִנְאָֽה׃ <S%H7068><s%> and envy

אֲ‍ֽנִי־ <S%H589><s%> I רָ֭אִיתִי <S%H7200><s%> I have seen אֱוִ֣יל <S%H191><s%> the foolish מַשְׁרִ֑ישׁ <S%H8327><s%> taking root וָאֶקּ֖וֹב <S%H5344><s%> I cursed נָוֵ֣הוּ <S%H5116><s%> his habitation פִתְאֹֽם׃ <S%H6597><s%> but suddenly

יִרְחֲק֣וּ <S%H7368><s%> are far בָנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> His children מִיֶּ֑שַׁע <S%H3468><s%> from safety וְיִֽדַּכְּא֥וּ <S%H1792><s%> and they are crushed בַ֝שַּׁ֗עַר <S%H8179><s%> in the gate וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there מַצִּֽיל׃ <S%H5337><s%> neither [is there] any to deliver

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after קְצִיר֨וֹ ׀ <S%H7105><s%> Whose harvest רָ֘עֵ֤ב <S%H7456><s%> famish יֹאכֵ֗ל <S%H398><s%> eateth up וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> it even out מִצִּנִּ֥ים <S%H6791><s%> of the thorns יִקָּחֵ֑הוּ <S%H3947><s%> and taketh וְשָׁאַ֖ף <S%H7602><s%> swalloweth up צַמִּ֣ים <S%H6782><s%> and the robber חֵילָֽם׃ <S%H2428><s%> their substance

כִּ֤י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> cometh not forth מֵעָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> of the dust אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> Although affliction וּ֝מֵאֲדָמָ֗ה <S%H127><s%> of the ground לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִצְמַ֥ח <S%H6779><s%> spring out עָמָֽל׃ <S%H5999><s%> neither doth trouble

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> Yet man לְעָמָ֣ל <S%H5999><s%> unto trouble יוּלָּ֑ד <S%H3205><s%> is born וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted רֶ֝֗שֶׁף <S%H7565><s%> arrow יַגְבִּ֥יהוּ <S%H1361><s%> upward עֽוּף׃ <S%H5774><s%> fly

אוּלָ֗ם <S%H199><s%> for אֲ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> Me אֶדְרֹ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> seek אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> before אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> unto God וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> before אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> and unto God אָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> would I commit דִּבְרָתִֽי׃ <S%H1700><s%> my cause

עֹשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> Which doeth גְ֭דֹלוֹת <S%H1419><s%> great things וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else חֵ֑קֶר <S%H2714><s%> things נִ֝פְלָא֗וֹת <S%H6381><s%> marvellous things עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else מִסְפָּֽר׃ <S%H4557><s%> without number

הַנֹּתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Who giveth מָ֭טָר <S%H4306><s%> rain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> up פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> upon אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְשֹׁ֥לֵֽחַ <S%H7971><s%> and sendeth מַ֝יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> up פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon חוּצֽוֹת׃ <S%H2351><s%> the fields

לָשׂ֣וּם <S%H7760><s%> To set up שְׁפָלִ֣ים <S%H8217><s%> those that be low לְמָר֑וֹם <S%H4791><s%> on high וְ֝קֹדְרִ֗ים <S%H6937><s%> that those which mourn שָׂ֣גְבוּ <S%H7682><s%> may be exalted יֶֽשַׁע׃ <S%H3468><s%> to safety

מֵ֭פֵר <S%H6565><s%> He disappointeth מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <S%H4284><s%> the devices עֲרוּמִ֑ים <S%H6175><s%> of the crafty וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot תַעֲשֶׂ֥ינָה <S%H6213><s%> cannot perform יְ֝דֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H3027><s%> so that their hands תּוּשִׁיָּֽה׃ <S%H8454><s%> [their] enterprise

לֹכֵ֣ד <S%H3920><s%> He taketh חֲכָמִ֣ים <S%H2450><s%> the wise בְּעָרְמָ֑ם <S%H6193><s%> in their own craftiness וַעֲצַ֖ת <S%H6098><s%> and the counsel נִפְתָּלִ֣ים <S%H6617><s%> of the froward נִמְהָֽרָה׃ <S%H4116><s%> is carried headlong

יוֹמָ֥ם <S%H3119><s%> in the daytime יְפַגְּשׁוּ־ <S%H6298><s%> They meet חֹ֑שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> with darkness וְ֝כַלַּ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> as in the night יְֽמַשְׁשׁ֥וּ <S%H4959><s%> and grope בַֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <S%H6672><s%> in the noonday

וַיֹּ֣שַׁע <S%H3467><s%> But he saveth מֵ֭חֶרֶב <S%H2719><s%> from the sword מִפִּיהֶ֑ם <S%H6310><s%> from their mouth וּמִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> and from the hand חָזָ֣ק <S%H2389><s%> of the mighty אֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H34><s%> the poor
וַתְּהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> has לַדַּ֣ל <S%H1800><s%> So the poor תִּקְוָ֑ה <S%H8615><s%> hath hope וְ֝עֹלָ֗תָה <S%H5766><s%> and iniquity קָ֣פְצָה <S%H7092><s%> stoppeth פִּֽיהָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> her mouth

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אַשְׁרֵ֣י <S%H835><s%> Behold happy אֱ֭נוֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> [is] the man יוֹכִחֶ֣נּֽוּ <S%H3198><s%> correcteth אֱל֑וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> whom God וּמוּסַ֥ר <S%H4148><s%> not thou the chastening שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <S%H7706><s%> of the Almighty אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּמְאָֽס׃ <S%H3988><s%> therefore despise

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יַכְאִ֣יב <S%H3510><s%> For he maketh sore וְיֶחְבָּ֑שׁ <S%H2280><s%> and bindeth up יִ֝מְחַ֗ץ <S%H4272><s%> he woundeth [וְיָדֹו כ] (וְיָדָ֥יו <S%H3027><s%> able ק) תִּרְפֶּֽינָה׃ <S%H7495><s%> make whole

בְּשֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> thee in six צָ֭רוֹת <S%H6869><s%> troubles יַצִּילֶ֑ךָּ <S%H5337><s%> He shall deliver וּבְשֶׁ֓בַע ׀ <S%H7651><s%> yea in seven לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יִגַּ֖ע <S%H5060><s%> touch בְּךָ֣ רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> there shall no evil

בְּ֭רָעָב <S%H7458><s%> In famine פָּֽדְךָ֣ <S%H6299><s%> he shall redeem מִמָּ֑וֶת <S%H4194><s%> thee from death וּ֝בְמִלְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> and in war מִ֣ידֵי <S%H3027><s%> from the power חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> of the sword

בְּשׁ֣וֹט <S%H7752><s%> from the scourge לָ֭שׁוֹן <S%H3956><s%> of the tongue תֵּחָבֵ֑א <S%H2244><s%> Thou shalt be hid וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and you תִירָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> neither shalt thou be afraid מִ֝שֹּׁ֗ד <S%H7701><s%> of destruction כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> when it cometh

לְשֹׁ֣ד <S%H7701><s%> At destruction וּלְכָפָ֣ן <S%H3720><s%> and famine תִּשְׂחָ֑ק <S%H7832><s%> thou shalt laugh וּֽמֵחַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> of the beasts הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּירָֽא׃ <S%H3372><s%> neither shalt thou be afraid

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> with the stones הַשָּׂדֶ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field בְרִיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1285><s%> For thou shalt be in league וְחַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> and the beasts הַ֝שָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field הָשְׁלְמָה־ <S%H7999><s%> shall be at peace לָֽךְ׃

וְֽ֭יָדַעְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> And thou shalt know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> [shall be] in peace אָהֳלֶ֑ךָ <S%H168><s%> that thy tabernacle וּֽפָקַדְתָּ֥ <S%H6485><s%> and thou shalt visit נָ֝וְךָ <S%H5116><s%> thy habitation וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no תֶחֱטָֽא׃ <S%H2398><s%> and shalt not sin

וְֽ֭יָדַעְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> Thou shalt know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> [shall be] great זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <S%H2233><s%> also that thy seed וְ֝צֶאֱצָאֶ֗יךָ <S%H6631><s%> and thine offspring כְּעֵ֣שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> as the grass הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

תָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> Thou shalt come בְכֶ֣לַח <S%H3624><s%> in a full age אֱלֵי־ <S%H413><s%> to קָ֑בֶר <S%H6913><s%> to [thy] grave כַּעֲל֖וֹת <S%H5927><s%> cometh in גָּדִ֣ישׁ <S%H1430><s%> like as a shock of corn בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6256><s%> in his season

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold זֹ֭את <S%H2063><s%> we חֲקַרְנ֥וּהָ <S%H2713><s%> Lo this we have searched כֶּֽן־ <S%H3651><s%> it so הִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> it שְׁ֝מָעֶ֗נָּה <S%H8085><s%> it so it [is] hear וְאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> it דַֽע־ <S%H3045><s%> it and know לָֽךְ׃ פ
